meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ungodly.
meanings.sent1: The ungodliness of his actions was evident to all.
meanings.sent2: Her behavior was a clear example of ungodliness.
meanings.sent3: The ungodliness of the situation made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of kindness, his ungodliness stood out like a sore thumb.
meanings.sent5: The ungodliness of the storm made it seem almost alive.

meanings.definition: Behavior that is contrary to religious or moral principles.
meanings.sent1: The community was shocked by the ungodliness of his behavior.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her ungodliness in the way she treated others.
meanings.sent3: Despite his ungodliness, he always managed to make people smile.
meanings.sent4: The ungodliness of his actions painted a dark picture of his character.
meanings.sent5: The ungodliness of the decision left a lasting impact on everyone involved.
